AzureSettings.TenantId: <fill in the Tenant ID from the Azure Portal>
AzureSettings.SubscriptionId: <fill in the Subscription ID from the Azure Portal>
AzureSettings.ClientId: <fill in the Service Principal ID from the Azure Portal>
AzureSettings.ClientSecret: <fill in the Service Principal Secret from the Azure Portal>

DataFactory.ResourceGroup: <Resource Group name where Data Factory is located>
DataFactory.Name: <Data Factory Name>

SynapseWorkspace.ResourceGroup: <Resource Group name were Synapse is located>
SynapseWorkspace.Name: <Synapse Workspace Name>
